title: Creamy Chicken Potato with Simply Stir Garlic & Herbs
directions: Cook the potatoes by microwaving for 8 minutes on high and then place into a preheated oven, Gas 6, 200 Â°C for 25-30 minutes until cooked through.
Heat the chicken with the Simply Stir in a pan over a low heat for 3-4 minutes, split the potatoes in half and spoon the chicken mixture over.
ingredients: 200 ml Philadelphia Simply Stir Garlic & Herbs
